quotes.text: Happiness must be taken, and I will take mine.
quotes.author: Lord Shen

quotes.text: Quit, don't quit. Noodles, don't noodles... You are too concerned with what was and what will be. There's a saying: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present.
quotes.author: Master Oogway

quotes.text: Oogway made a mistake choosing you as the Dragon Warrior. I just didn't realize how big a mistake it was until now.
quotes.author: Tai Lung

quotes.text: Before the battle of the fist, comes the battle of the mind.
quotes.author: Master Shifu

quotes.text: But I like who I am!
quotes.author: Po

quotes.text: If you only do what you can do, you will never be more than you are now.
quotes.author: Master Shifu

quotes.text: Legend tells of a legendary warrior whose kung fu skills were the stuff of legend.
quotes.author: Po

quotes.text: It is time to become who you are meant to be.
quotes.author: Po

quotes.text: The dead exist in the past, and I must tend to the future.
quotes.author: Lord Shen

quotes.text: You are too concerned with what was and what will be.
quotes.author: Master Oogway
